title: He Doesn't Want His Ex To Hate Him
itunes:title: He Doesn't Want His Ex To Hate Him
description:
Dear Steve and Shirley, I have been dating a man for almost two years and I won’t move in with him until I get a ring and he’s fully over his ex. He was in a 10 year relationship when we met and he said that he was just looking for a reason to leave. He said that he didn’t love her and would never marry her because she has anger issues and she started smoking cigarettes...........................................

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:
Dear Steve and Shirley, I have been dating a man for almost two years and I won’t move in with him until I get a ring and he’s fully over his ex. He was in a 10 year relationship when we met and he said that he was just looking for a reason to leave. He said that he didn’t love her and would never marry her because she has anger issues and she started smoking cigarettes...........................................
